page.title: 10COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Of the 79 residences in the village 63 have phones of standard GPO issue. Long distance telephone reception is not very good & some wiring is about 40 years old. There is 1 telephone box which is used often & kept clean. There is a Royal Observer Corp base at Blaen Plwyf Uchaf. The postal service has 1 delivery & 2 collections, 10 & 4.30. If letters are wrongly addressed they may take over a week to arrive. Local parcels may be sent on the bus. Communication between villagers is only by word of mouth & 2 notice boards which is not always effective. There are occasional village business meetings in the village hall.
